posts.post_content:
[STRIKE]$210[/STRIKE] $175 net to me.

1909 RPPC Connie Mack & Philadelphia Inquirer World Series Tourists at Shibe Park. I am pretty sure that these were contest winners of some sort.

The back is fun too. The postcard arrived postage due and appears to be addressed to Base Ball Mt., Letter Carrier, City. It is amazing that it arrived anywhere.

I read it as "base ball nut". 

Rob M
